https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9cWhBP9TNQqq372tz4yC08TG1Ky.jpg This documentary follows the life of Seven children who are working under extreme conditions at India's busiest cremation ground, Manikarnika in Banaras. Children of the Pyre
